title: bard design
body:
well i looked at the bard spash and then it came to me that the little wisp chime thingies reminded me of princess mononoke from studio ghibli and the mask n stuff :/
pls rito i wanna know was that what u guys were thinking of when u made bard? just wanna know :3

replies.body: Why do you have a :/ face?? loads of champions are based off anime characters, riven is a reference to Inuyasha, Katarina's 'shunpo' and Irelia's 'Hiten style' are direct references to 'Shunpo' from Bleach and Kenshin Himura's 'Hiten Mitsurugi style' plus loads loads more.
